name: Wizard of the White Council
description: You are a fully trained wizard and a member of the White Council of Wizards.

name: The Sight
description: You have the ability to perceive the true nature of things, seeing through veils and illusions.

name: Marked by Power
description: You've been touched by supernatural power, and it shows to those who know how to look.

name: In Over My Head
description: You're dealing with forces far beyond your usual experience or capability.

name: Mortal Born to Magic
description: You were born with magical talent, whether you've developed it or not.

name: Emissary of a Fae Court
description: You represent either the Summer or Winter Court in mortal affairs.

name: Champion of God
description: You serve a higher power and are empowered by your faith.

name: Cursed by the Supernatural
description: A supernatural entity has placed a curse upon you that affects your life.

name: Touched by the Nevernever
description: You've spent time in the Nevernever, and it has left its mark on you.

name: Accords Signatory
description: You are a recognized member of the Unseelie Accords with all the rights and responsibilities that entails.
